title: Universal Capabilities
description: One architecture, infinite possibilities. Experience how ShipMyAgent transforms daily workflows across every domain.

coding.title: Full-Stack Engineer
coding.description: While you rest, Agent reads the documentation, rewrites the authentication module, and ensures all tests pass. You wake up to a green PR, ready to merge.

research.title: Academic Researcher
research.description: Your AI research assistant. It digests 200 Arxiv papers in an hour, synthesizing key innovations and identifying potential experimental flaws for your review.

business.title: Business Intelligence
business.description: Monitors global e-commerce data 24/7. When competitors adjust pricing, it calculates margin impacts and suggests counter-strategies before your morning briefing.

finance.title: Financial Analyst
finance.description: Connects to exchange APIs to watch millisecond-level ticks. It executes arbitrage trades based on your custom RSI/MACD strategy, grinding profits automatically.

content.title: Creative Studio
content.description: Give Agent a topic, and it scouts trending memes, drafts SEO-optimized scripts with scene descriptions, and auto-generates cover art for your next viral post.

news.title: Information Curator
news.description: Filters 99% of the noise. It delivers refined updates on specific topics like 'Solana on-chain anomalies' or 'New Growth Hacks', respecting your attention span.

office.title: Chief of Staff
office.description: Auto-replies to routine queries, resolves cross-timezone scheduling conflicts, and prioritizes your Notion board. It manages the chaos so you can focus on strategy.

data.title: Data Scientist
data.description: Queries the data warehouse directly. It analyzes attribution models and renders charts to explain why DAU dropped, without you writing a single line of SQL.

career.title: Career Coach
career.description: Analyzes keywords from hundreds of job descriptions. It tailors a unique resume for each application and automates follow-ups to increase your interview rate.

bottom_text: And unlimited more scenarios defined by you. Your Agent learns, adapts, and grows with your needs.
